raw_text: HERFT – YVONNE MARVIS (nee WHITE) – 13.8.1931-15.8.2023. Beloved wife of Anselm (dec.),​ Beautiful and adored mother of Maxine,​ Daisy,​ Harold (dec.),​ Jack,​ Cedric and Tarnia,​ mother-in-law of Charlie (Revd: Charles Jansz),​ Christie (dec),​ Cleone,​ Yvonne,​ Dianne and Roderick. Memorable and much loved grandmother of Craig,​ Shannon,​ Amanda,​ Jared,​ Rebecca,​ Esther,​ Jadon and Kaine. Strong and kind matriarch of the family to children,​ grandchildren and great grandchildren,​ whose memory will live forever in their hearts. Was called Home on the 15th of August 2023. “… and I shall dwell in the house of the Lord forever….”052527

PERUMAL – HELEN (nee FERNANDOPULLE),​ wife of late Prosper,​ daughter of late Alice & Lewis,​ precious mother of late Godwin and of Eunice & Granville,​ precious sister of Elsie,​ mother-in-law of Dawn & Rohan Casiechitty,​ adored grandmother of Rozelle & Radley,​ Rendl & Avril,​ great grandmother of Jaylen. Cortege leaves residence No. 146,​ New Chetty Street,​ Kotahena on Tuesday,​ 22nd August at 4 p.m. for burial at General Cemetery Kanatte (Roman Catholic Section).052528
